short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to share a link to the current page to player.me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a simple menu in which to share a link to the page you're currently browsing to player.me. You are given the option to enter a message to go with the link you are sharing, but if you don't give a message, the title of the current page will be used instead.
